column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I used to think this place was not so authentic
column2: but my opinion has GREATLY changed!  Great sangria
column3: and the tapas are really good!!!  The pimientos de padron are not quite like they are in Spain
column4: but the other stuff I've tried is pretty good!  I ALWAYS get a pitcher of red sangria
column8: and the bacon-wrapped dates.  You can't go wrong with any of those!  I also find the prices the be quite reasonable... probably the reason it's always SO packed.
